fields.name: Administrator
fields.responsibilities: Controls the view/interface service settings, assigns Editors to the service, assigns Editors to review projects/components; can perform actions of Administrator, Editor, and Reviewer.

fields.name: Senior Editor
fields.responsibilities: Has all Administrator functions except control of the service’s settings.

fields.name: Editor
fields.responsibilities: Accepts or declines review assignments from Administrator or Senior Editor; assigns Reviewers to review projects/components; Renders decisions of accepted, rejected, or revision on submittables for the service.

fields.name: Reviewer
fields.responsibilities: Accepts or declines review assignments from Editor/Senior Editor/Administrator; Submits review to Editor/Senior Editor/Administrator.

fields.name: Author
fields.responsibilities: Administrator of a project/component. Submits submittables for which they are an administrator to be included in that service.
